item.title: Practical Service Design - guides, resources, and community
item.description:
Practical Service Design - guides, resources, and community

Our world is now made of services. We need new tools to think across this space, to not only create memorable and valuable experiences for our customers, but also empower our organizations to change the way we do business for the better.

item.title: Video: What is service design?
item.description:
Video: What is service design?

Design Methods Step 1: Discover Step one in a four-part guide for anyone who wants to understand the methods designers use and try them out for themselves. Discover - keep your perspectives wide, allowing for a broad range of ideas and influences.

item.title: Katie Koch // Putting Service Design Into Practice // Service Experience Conference 2015
item.description:
Katie Koch // Putting Service Design Into Practice // Service Experience Conference 2015

How do you practice service design when you don't have the budget, time, or scope to impact the entire service? On my design team at American Express we've...

item.title: This Company Retains 95% of Its Employees - Here's Its Secret
item.description:
This Company Retains 95% of Its Employees - Here's Its Secret

The last 10 years of Joel Grossman's life started with a seemingly casual introduction through a business school friend to Location Labs CEO Tasso Roumeliotis. "I was getting my MBA and looking for a Bay Area tech internship, but I wanted to work for a company with a business model I really believed in," he says.

item.title: Design Kit
item.description:
Design Kit

Design Kit is IDEO.org's platform to learn human-centered design, a creative approach to solving the world's most difficult problems.

item.title: 10 Best Chrome Extensions For Designers To Skyrocket Your Career
item.description:
10 Best Chrome Extensions For Designers To Skyrocket Your Career

I've selected some of the best Chrome extensions for designers to skyrocket your career by saving you time, making you a better writer and increasing your focus and productivity.

item.title: ExperienceFellow - research customer experience with mobile ethnography
item.description:
ExperienceFellow - research customer experience with mobile ethnography

ExperienceFellow has been developed for quick and easy professional CX research. Its whole concept is based on a solid research method called mobile ethnography. Read more about it.

item.title: Web Animations In Interaction Design: 2016 And Beyond
item.description:
Web Animations In Interaction Design: 2016 And Beyond

We'll explain web animation's 5 most effective uses, as well as what to expect the near future. But in order to understand where animation is at now and where it's going, you must first know where it came from.
